positron.codeCells.configuration.title: Code Cells
positron.codeCells.configuration.cellSty: Controls the style of code cell decorations. Colors are configurable with the `notebook.selectedCellBackground` and `interactive.activeCodeBorder` theme colors. See https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color for more information about the available theme colors and how to override them.
Highlight the active cell's border and background.
positron.codeCells.configuration.additio: Additional text that marks the start of a new cell (e.g., for Databricks notebooks)
